DOC.brief_summary: The old mouse brain derive Japanese encephalitis vaccine ( MBJEV ) report cause serious adverse effect therefore replace novel Ixiaro vaccine . The present study investigate whether vaccinee prim MBJEV boost Ixiaro . Travellers receive Japanese encephalitis vaccine enrol follow-up immune response four group : A ) primary immunization BMJEV , B ) primary secondary immunization MBJEV , C ) primary immunization Ixiaro S ) Primary immunization MBJEV secondary immunization Ixiaro . Immune responses follow help serum sample collect vaccination .
